# Summarize Data

```{r arguments}
pathCase <- "output/data_generate/saveData_dCase.RDS"
pathCtrl <- "output/data_generate/saveData_dCtrl.RDS"

plotHist <- function(input, main, xlab, ylab = "Frequency", brk = 100) {
    hist(input, breaks = brk, main = main, xlab = xlab, ylab = ylab)
}

dCase <- readRDS(pathCase)
dCtrl <- readRDS(pathCtrl)
```

### Input data

Experiment contains `r ncol(dCase)` cases and `r ncol(dCtrl)` controls. 
Each sample has `r nrow(dCase)` probes.

### Within group correlation {.tabset}

Correlation between samples within group. Outputting figures in pdf.

#### Case

```{r out.width=750, out.height=750, dev = "pdf"}
plotHist(cor(dCase), "Case", "r")
```

#### Control
```{r out.width=750, out.height=750, dev = "pdf"}
plotHist(cor(dCtrl), "Control", "r")
```
